div.h2: CARIN Blue Button SNOMEDCT Procedure Codes Value Set

div.p: This value set includes codes from the following code systems:
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 71388002 (Procedure)
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct, where the codes are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/procedure-code
